item.title: Tikinang's 2nd 🧠
item.description: Hi humans! …and welcome to my 2nd 🧠 …my digital garden 🌱🪴 …my personal knowledge-base 📖 whoami? call myself “Tikinang” for whatever reason 🤙 live in Prague, Czech Republic 🇨🇿 work as back-end Go developer 💻🦫 knowledge hunter 🏹📚 BJJ enthusiast 🥋 [[notes/Résumé|Résumé]] for head-hunters Few of My Recent Writings [[notes/Investment Guidelines 2022|Investment Guidelines 2022]] [[notes/Man’s Search for Meaning|Man’s Search for Meaning]] All of them HERE
